content:
- Zero at primary screen, full (Banana pi) at secondary screen; both with battery
- When plugging, charge both screens
- Accessory for using old phone on new phone as dual-screen. Secondary/old phone will have its own OS. Both will be charged with a special cable
- Hp from SpcDcnt
- Primary: 1200 MaH, NFC, SD, dual-SIM
- Secondary: 2400 MaH, Bluetooth, WiFi, SD, E-Ink touch display
title: 0. R Pi
